meanings.sent1: The superconducting material allowed electricity to flow without resistance.
meanings.sent2: The superconducting wire was able to carry a large amount of current.
meanings.sent3: The superconducting magnets made the scientists' experiments much easier.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was like a superconducting circuit, processing information effortlessly.
meanings.sent5: The superconducting properties of the alloy were truly remarkable.

meanings.sent1: The superconducting coil cooled rapidly to reach its superconducting state.
meanings.sent2: The superconducting material lost all resistance when cooled below a certain temperature.
meanings.sent3: The superconducting train glided silently along the track, impressing the passengers.
meanings.sent4: His calm demeanor was like a superconducting shield, deflecting any negativity.
meanings.sent5: The superconducting properties of the substance were a scientific breakthrough.
